overview: "Albert & Herbert" is a classic TV series about a scrap dealer and his son. They live in an old wooden house at Skolgatan 15 in Gothenburg together with the horse Hercules. \"The best of Albert & Herbert\" vol 1 contains 7 episodes. 1. Health above all else 2. It's me and little Frida 3. Dumber 4. Voices from above 5. On tu man hand 6. The Cuckoo King 7. The holiday trip
title: Albert & Herbert Volume 1
